readable.title: 2839532455_36a7dc4758
readable.content: A black , white , and brown dog is playing with a green and pink ball on sand . A dog is in the sand with a pink and green tennis ball in his mouth . A little dog plays with a colorful ball in the sand . A small terrier plays with a tennis ball on the beach . The white dog , with dark patches , is playing in the sand with a tennis ball in its mouth .
